citations.narrative:
A complete physical exam of all the adult dogs has not been completed in the past year. Not having the physical exams
completed doesn't ensure that adequate veterinary care is being provided to the dogs. The licensee must have the
Attending Veterinarian conduct annual exams on all the adult dogs. Correct by 8/19/23.

The licensee has not had the adult dogs sampled for heartworm or fecal parasites. Not having the dogs sampled for
heartworm or fecal parasites doesn't ensure the dogs are adequately protected from the various parasites. All dogs must
be sampled for heartworm and fecal parasites in accordance with a plan from the Attending Veterinarian. Correct by
8/19/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(2) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
A complete physical exam of all the adult dogs has not been completed in the past year. Not having the physical exams 
completed doesn't ensure that adequate veterinary care is being provided to the dogs. The licensee must have the 
Attending Veterinarian conduct annual exams on all the adult dogs. Correct by 8/19/23. 
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The licensee has not had the adult dogs sampled for heartworm or fecal parasites. Not having the dogs sampled for 
heartworm or fecal parasites doesn't ensure the dogs are adequately protected from the various parasites. All dogs must 
be sampled for heartworm and fecal parasites in accordance with a plan from the Attending Veterinarian. Correct by 
8/19/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report.
